text: "Waiting for a Girl Like You" is a 1981 song by British American band by Foreigner and is the second single from their 4th studio album 4. It went to number 2 in the United States for 10 weeks, number 2 in Canada, number 3 in Australia, number 8 in the United Kingdom and number 9 in Canada. == References == Category:1981 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Foreigner (band) songs
title: Waiting for a Girl Like You
